title: Understanding and Applying Wavelet Domain Competitive Learning Algorithms

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational machine learning, neural network architecture comprehension, and basic Python programming proficiency
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone-based learning platforms, providing focused explanations of key concepts and practical guides in offline sessions

learning_goals: Participants can explain the fundamental principles of wavelet transforms and competitive learning.
Participants can implement a neural network unit selection method using the Partial Distance Search (PDS) technique.
Participants can numerically compare the computational efficiency improvements of wavelet domain algorithms over traditional competitive learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
